## QuestionComponent interface

Represents a question component used to display a field to set a form control value.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface QuestionComponent<TBindings extends object | null = null, TFormState extends object | null = null, TQuestion extends Question<TBindings, TFormState> = Question<TBindings, TFormState>> 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [control](./dynamic-forms.questioncomponent.control.md) | Maybe&lt;AbstractControl&gt; | The control accociated with the question |
|  [hideField$](./dynamic-forms.questioncomponent.hidefield_.md) | Observable&lt;boolean&gt; | An observable emitting true if the question field should be hidden |
|  [question](./dynamic-forms.questioncomponent.question.md) | Immutable&lt;TQuestion&gt; | The question component view configuration |
|  [required?](./dynamic-forms.questioncomponent.required.md) | boolean | <i>(Optional)</i> Set to true to indicate the question is required. |
|  [stateBindings](./dynamic-forms.questioncomponent.statebindings.md) | [StateBindingsMap](./dynamic-forms.statebindingsmap.md)<!-- -->&lt;TBindings&gt; | Bindings to form state |
